Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-52969 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.24-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-52969 affecting package mariadb for versions less than 10.6.24-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package mariadb is earlier than 10.6.24-1, affected by CVE-2023-52969
